result: A) "[...] The word flu came to us after a series of contagion between languages."B) "It departed from Italy in 1743 the influenza epidemic [...]".C) "The first was a term derived from the influence of medieval Latin, which meant 'influence of stars on men'."D) "The second was only the nominal form of the gripper verb [...]".E) “It is supposed to refer to violent mode as the virus takes over the infected organism.”
